scripts.test-all: pnpm test && pnpm test-wasm && pnpm test-loom
scripts.test-wasm: cd crates/loro-wasm && pnpm i && pnpm build-dev
scripts.test-loom: LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=2 RUSTFLAGS='--cfg loom' cargo test -p loro --test multi_thread_test --release
scripts.test-loom-reproduce: LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=2 LOOM_LOG=info LOOM_LOCATION=1 LOOM_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL=1 LOOM_CHECKPOINT_FILE=loom_test.json RUSTFLAGS='--cfg loom' cargo test -p loro --test multi_thread_test --release
scripts.coverage: mkdir -p coverage && cargo llvm-cov nextest --features test_utils,jsonpath --lcov > coverage/lcov-nextest.info && cargo llvm-cov report
scripts.release-wasm: deno run -A ./scripts/sync-loro-version.ts && cd crates/loro-wasm && pnpm i && pnpm build-release
scripts.run-fuzz-corpus: cd crates/fuzz && cargo +nightly fuzz run all -- -max_total_time=1
